title: #158: In The United States
description:
America is a hypocritical society filled with magical thinking, flawed logic, neverending lies, media manipulation, medical disinformation, religious weirdos, and political snake oil salesmen.

The trick to navigating through the constantly changing set of rules and cultural norms is to have a sense of humor and laugh at the insanity of it all. “In the United States” is an excerpt from the new book Hypocrazy that will be available in September.
